articles.title: Amarnath trip was dream: Kin of Delhi sisters-in-law who died in flash flood
articles.description: The two women from Delhi were among the 17 people who died in a flash flood that hit a camp near the Amarnath cave shrine, in Ganderbal district of Jammu and Kashmir, on Friday.
